programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his familys expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his familys reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: Lonely Eighteen
programme.desc: Set in the 1980s Hong Kong, Elaine and her best friend Ying enter the entertainment industry hoping to change their fates from poverty. Ying soon becomes a popular porn star but Elaine is lost between being her true self and an actress. When show business declines after a decade, their choices lead them to two different paths in life.

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Master Luo, a washed-up stuntman, trains his beloved horse Red Hare to be a stunt horse. Due to his debts though, Red Hare may be taken away by the debtors. Master Luo has no choice but to seek help from his estranged daughter, and the incident ends up becoming a golden opportunity for them to reconcile.

programme.title: Born to Fly
programme.desc: Lei Yu has officially become the new generation of Chinese test pilots after rounds of strict selection. Captain Zhang Ting leads Lei Yu and other pilots to test the latest fighter jets. Lei Yu keeps pushing the limits in each test flight in the hope of coming up with the perfect plane to ensure the safety of the fighter pilots.

programme.title: The Locksmith
programme.desc: Locksmith Master Shan suffers from dementia and passes on his skills to Hao Ren, who surpasses him. Detective Liu often seeks Hao Ren's help and they become good friends. When Hao Ren reunites with an old friend one day, he accidentally unfolds the truth behind Shan's wife's disappearance, leading to a chain of mysterious events.

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: The Chinese Feast
programme.desc: Sun wants to start a new life as a chef in Canada and struggles to learn cooking skills from a restaurant owner, Au. While Sun will represent his restaurant to participate in a cooking competition, his skill is not good enough, and he has to seek help from a legendary master chef in order to win the ultimate challenge.

programme.title: Customs Frontline
programme.desc: After boarding an unauthorized cargo ship and finding its entire crew dead, the Hong Kong Customs officers uncover a hidden cache of illegal weapons linked to an international conflict. As Customs officer Zhou Zheng Li and Interpols Ying go undercover, they unveil a multinational operation with ties closer to home.

programme.title: Fight Back to School II
programme.desc: Star Chow (Stephen Chow) is an officer in the Royal Hong Kong Police's elite Special Duties Unit (SDU). During a meeting with his senior officer, Inspector Yip (Deanie Ip), Star jokingly suggests he wish to be reassigned to the traffic unit. Star immediately finds himself demoted to Constable engaging in traffic duty on the streets of Hong Kong. After being made the scapegoat for a failed high school terrorist investigation, Star hastily resigns from the police. He decides to enroll at the high school to launch his own private investigation. But Star realises the investigation won't be easy when he discovers that the bumbling, incompetent CID detective Tat (Ng Man Tat) is also undercover at the high school.

programme.title: Wise Guys Never Die
programme.desc: Nick meets Teddy, a con artiste, when he is sent to prison for embezzlement, and Teddy teaches him all the gambling tricks. After their release, they team up with Teddys lover Lora, to take revenge on Dragon, who framed Teddy for his sentence. Nick though is seduced by Lora and they end up in an affair. Will Nick finally join Teddy in his revenge?

programme.title: Beyond the Dream
programme.desc: Primary school teacher Lok is a recovering schizophrenic who falls in love with a young girl he first met. As he struggles to reveal his illness, Lok has a relapse and becomes delusional. Little does he know she is a mental health counsellor who has a hidden agenda. The pair develops a relationship that is beyond their wildest dreams.

programme.title: 97 Aces Go Places
programme.desc: Hao Shi becomes the new triad boss after his father is killed by the pretty swindler, Ling. While professional gunman Drunken Gun is tasked to help Hao Shi take revenge, Ling is hunted by gangster Lei, from whom she has conned 2 million dollars. In the process, Hao Shi and Drunken Gun accidentally arrest Lei instead...

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the Gang of Five in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Two Tigers
programme.desc: This crime comedy is about a bumbling young man Fang Nan, who kidnaps a middle-aged businessman Zhang Cheng Gong for ransom. However, the captor becomes the captive when Zhang turns the tables on Fang and forces him to complete three tasks. The two men soon find themselves sharing a journey filled with absurdity and deception.

programme.title: Mission Milano
programme.desc: A wealthy entrepreneur goes undercover with an Interpol agent to protect a new invention, the Seed of God, from falling into an international crime conglomerate.

programme.title: Stand Up Story
programme.desc: Mancer knows his father Wah is intellectually challenged since young and has to take care of him after his mother left them. When Mancer discovers and finds solace in stand-up comedy, he learns that hardships provide the best comedic material - from his own school ridicule experience to pandemic woes, misery can fuel laughter!

programme.title: 72 Tenants of Prosperity
programme.desc: Ha Kung and Shek Kin are sworn brothers, but become sworn enemies in business and every aspect of life after Pinky, the girl they love, marries Ha Kung. It is only when the property owner of both their shops wants to terminate their tenancies forty years later, that they are able to resolve the rivalry.

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: Donnie Yen plays a Hong Kong police officer who is highly skilled in martial arts but balloons to more than 200 pounds after his fianc left him. His boss can only assign simple tasks to him like escorting a criminal to Japan, but can he complete it?

programme.title: Chilli Laugh Story
programme.desc: Coba is forced to work at home during COVID-19 and fights with his family every day. He decides to turn his mothers chilli sauce into a trendy commodity to keep his family occupied. With his mother, father and aunt making the chilli sauce together, the family sells it online and the business grows beyond their imagination.

programme.title: The Unwavering Brotherhood
programme.desc: The revered elder of a triad gang faces succession uncertainty when his three trusted underlingsHua, Fei, and Guoare robbed while transporting gang money. Determined to redeem himself, Hua vows to track down the robbers. However, when Hua discovers that Fei and Guo are connected to the robbery, he must choose between loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Incredible
programme.desc: Middle-aged and retired superhero couple, Huan (Gazer Man) and Red (Aroma Woman), settles into a contented life in a remote village. They find it hard to contain their powers though, and are bored by the uneventful life. When they hear a world martial arts contest is to be held in their village, both are itching to make their long-awaited comeback!

programme.title: Love and Let Love!
programme.desc: Cliff proposes to his girlfriend Terry but is killed in a car accident before she says yes. Terry is devastated and inconsolable. When Cliff's ghost returns, they seem to go back to their good old days. However, Cliff is determined to help Terry get over his death and start anew.

programme.title: Hell Hole
programme.desc: The movie features three horror stories in different era: a pregnant woman haunted by a ghost sacrifices her life to save her baby; a boy commits suicide after being bullied by four medical students and his spirit returns for revenge; some company staff are haunted after they open a box of used clothes, releasing a more than 20-year resentment.

programme.title: One More Chance
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as a down-on-his-luck gambler, Water, whose ex-girlfriend asked him to take care of their autistic son. As Water lives with his son, he soon finds his goal in life. When he discovers his sons talent in running, Water decides to give up his dissipated life and support his son to achieve his dream.

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say yes?

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: Infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho came to Hong Kong as an illegal immigrant in 1963 and ruthlessly built an empire from the chaotic underworld of drug dealers and corrupt police who ruled the city under notorious detective Lee Rock.

programme.title: Rob N Roll
programme.desc: A ruthless bandit, Tian, has plotted an intense and quick armed robbery. When he encounters Hui and Shui who also plan for a robbery, they decide to team up for the heist. However, their ad-hoc and dramatic robbery has started a war with the police hot on pursuit, putting their lives on the line!

programme.title: Dust to Dust
programme.desc: Back in 1995, the Police successfully arrested five armed bank robbers while the two masterminds got tipped off and made a clean escape. Decades later, retired cop Wang Shou Yue is drawn back to the unsolved case when he sees a blurred figure in a news clip. A battle between good and evil has just begun!

programme.title: Cape No. 7
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer tries to deliver seven old love letters attentioned to a Tomoko. As he falls in love with a young Japanese model also named Tomoko, he unravels their serendipitous connection.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yong Zhen moves to Shanghai in the hope of becoming rich but ends up having to use his kung fu skills to survive and take revenge against the gang who killed his brother.

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The passion choir pilot program trains students from three underperforming schools choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the passion choir and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: Grandmaster, The
programme.desc: Directed by the acclaimed filmmaker Wong Kar Wai, this epic action feature begins in Foshan when Ip Man, the martial arts master from the south, takes up a challenge by ageing northern master Gong Yu Tian. Ip Man wins the fight, but is then defeated by Gong Yu Tians daughter Gong Er, with whom he forms an emotional bond

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: Brothers Five
programme.desc: The five Kao brothers, separated since birth, are unaware that the master of Teng Lung Manor has killed their father. All five however, vow to defeat the vicious gangsters at the manor due to their bullying ways. After reuniting and with much discipline and hard work, the Kaos are prepared to face Lung and his gang.

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu Lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun Yang.

programme.title: Legend Of The Fox
programme.desc: A young man, Chin, believes he is an orphan, until he meets three men and learns from them that his father was a great swordsman who was killed when he was trying to dispel rumors of a wrongdoing and return a lost sword to its rightful owner. Chin seeks out the mens help to take vengeance on the wrongful death of his father.

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, Three Sinners is a Huangmei Opera about love, betrayal, murder, and redemption. Starring Hong Kong's premiere movie couple, it is one of the grandest Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musicals in the Shaw Brothers library.

programme.title: Pursuit of Vengeance
programme.desc: Kung Fu legend Ti Lung stars in the action movie as Fu Xue Hong, embarking on a epic journey of revenge for his father.

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: Notorious Eight
programme.desc: The young Chen Chi-chin (Liu Yung) loses heavily to experienced gambler Hu Kuan-ten (Lo Lieh). His father loses at cards and dies of shock. Chen appeals to his uncle who summons seven fellow professional gamblers to carry out vengeance. Much more than a gambling film, this is a thrilling melting pot of martial arts stars, extortion, illicit love, poker-face vengeance, and all sorts of edge-of-your-seat gambling duels. Featuring two of the leading action stars of the era, Chen Kuen-tai and Lo Lieh, in a series of intense poker game standoffs. Famed director of the genre, Wong Jing, also has a guest appearance as one of the Notorious Eight.

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insiders look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiangs popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: The Lady Professional
programme.desc: Lily Ho is perfectly cast as a gun-for-hire who always gets her man - in more ways than one! The cast and crew shot on location in Japanese scenic spots such as Mount Fuji; and there are plenty of over-the-top thrills, as Lily even masquerades as a nun.

programme.title: Operation Lipstick
programme.desc: A professors assistant stole a micro-film storing the secret of a newly invented nuclear reactor and sells it to a crime syndicate. However, the micro-film accidentally falls into the hands of a nightclub dancer and a thief in the process, leading to them being relentlessly pursued by the crime syndicate to retrieve the micro-film.

programme.title: Raw Courage
programme.desc: After the Ming Emperor is overthrown and his infant son was put in the care of the Black Dragon Society, a traitorous martial arts clan attacks the society, forcing an inexperienced pair of swordsman and swordswoman to flee with the infant. Their journey to deliver the infant to safety is filled with dangers that would require help from other allies

programme.title: The Mirror and the Lichee
programme.desc: The curious title in this Huangmei Opera romance refers to the two props that signal a happy beginning between a scholar and a local beauty. The scholar polishes mirrors so as to be closer to his love, who signals her approval by tossing him some lichees. From that point on the course of their love becomes rocky, complete with murder and suicide.

programme.title: The Emperor and his Brother
programme.desc: The Emperor Qianlong is not the legitimate successor to the throne at birth, but he only learns the truth when two senior members of a subversive anti-government secret organisation contact him years later. As it happens, the chef of this organisation is Qianlongs younger brother and they must now confront each other in opposing roles

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: The Imperial Swordsman
programme.desc: Fu is a government officer heading home after being charged with falsifying reports. En route, he encounters & recruits a skilled swordsman as a bodyguard. They then meet a fleeing bride and her maid who asked to join them for protection. When the group reach a ruined temple however, a gang of assassins appear and attack them

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: Zhao was once defeated by Long in a duel. 7 years later, Long asks Zhao to make a unique lantern on his behalf to win the lantern contest, while Zhao plans for revenge. When Longs wife suddenly disappears one day and he hears about the story of human lanterns, Long suspects Zhao may be involved in the incident

programme.title: The Flag of Iron
programme.desc: When super director Chang Cheh found new talent and blood with "The Five Venoms" actors, most of which were trained in the highly acrobatic Chinese opera and well versed with exotic martial arts weapons, this created a new spark for his use of bizarre weapons in his films. The Flag Of Iron is one of 20 movies that he directed featuring the utterly flabbergasting and physically exhausting action bits created by these five dudes. You have the good guys from the righteous clan versus the bad guys from the villainous clan and it's so filled with "don't-blink-or-you-will-miss-something" gags, you will need to watch it over and over again so you can see the things you missed.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: Purple Darts
programme.desc: A girl vows to take revenge for her parents who were murdered by four outlaws when she was only a baby. To do so, she trains hard at martial arts and teams up with a swordsman and a couple to finally kill them all.

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, they are kept apart as she is engaged to another man. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: Portrait In Crystal
programme.desc: Tragic deaths in the underworld cause leader "Yama" (Teng Wei-hao) to suspect a portrait in crystal with mysterious powers. He sends Hen Pan (Chen Hung) and Pai Pan (Hung Hsin-nan) to interrogate its creator, martial artist Lung Fei (Pai Piao)...

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: Journey of the Doomed
programme.desc: Journey Of The Doomed stars Tung Wei as a knight that finds himself protecting the life of a beautiful young lady, the lost Emperor's daughter and stalked by a bunch of assassins headed by kung fu actress extraordinaire Hui Ying-Hung.

programme.title: Tragic Commitment
programme.desc: When the husband of a doctor, Tung is fatally wounded in an accident, he reveals to her about his affair with Blackie, who is impregnated with his baby. Despite the devastation of the betrayal and the eventual death of her husband, Tung is pressured by her mother-in-law into putting up with Blackie and offer $1M for her baby...

programme.title: Mr. Funnybone Strikes Again
programme.desc: In this hilarious sequel, Mr Big Potato opens an old-fashioned Chinese clinic, but his traditional methods are rejected by the sceptics of modern Hong Kong. Enter his buddy Mr Funny bone to rescue his business!

programme.title: The Jade Raksha
programme.desc: A fearsome swordswoman known as The Jade Raksha appears in the martial arts world and begins killing people whose surname is Yan. A swordsman figures out who she is and asks her why. Apparently a Yan killed her family 18 years ago and she only has vengeance on her mind

programme.title: The Blue and the Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return

programme.title: Clans of Intrigue
programme.desc: Heroic outlaw Chu Liu Xiang is dining with his friend Monk Wu Hua, when Gong from the Holy Water Palace appears and accuses Chu of stealing the holy water from her Palace and using it for various murders. Chu denies, and is given a month to find the murderer or be killed by Gong. To prove his innocence, Chu decides to investigate the case

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan, Madam White Bone and her sexy sister, and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: Come Drink with Me
programme.desc: The brother of the mystery swordswoman "Golden Swallow is kidnapped. She joins forces with a beggar Drunken Cat who is skilled in martial arts to free her brother from a Buddhist monastery run by a corrupt abbot. The film was selected as Hong Kongs entry for the Best Foreign Language Film at the 39th Academy Awards.

programme.title: Tales of Larceny
programme.desc: Connecting all the antics of bosses, monks, beggars, and thieves is the slippery and sinuous efforts of three pickpockets so adept at their chosen skill that they can even trick three beauties of their underwear without missing a step.

programme.title: Lion VS Lion
programme.desc: The traditional lion dance has never looked so good as in Lion VS Lion which captures the most impressive sequences of lion dancing on film. Besides being loaded with enjoyable martial arts chicanery, film historians can revel because it's also the first film that clearly demonstrates the intricacies and differences between the traditional Northern and Southern lion dancing techniques. The Five Venom alumnus and Chang Cheh discovery, Lo Meng, teams up with Liu Chia-liang protege Wang Yu, as they inadvertently turn from vagabond kung-fu school operators into anti-Ching, patriotic fighters.

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: Five Shaolin Masters
programme.desc: The Qing court plots to kill all Shaolin disciples by burning down Shaolin Temple. This sudden fire killed almost everyone except for five disciples. To take revenge on the Qing court, the five of them train hard in different fighting styles to become The Five Shaolin Masters.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep23
programme.desc: A prince and a commoner who are best friends keep having to thwart the plots of the prince's scheming, ambitious minister.

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai Ep141
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.desc: HaGoLa' is the story of three naughty little friends - Lattha, Hathgola and Goli, who live in a unique world of objects.

programme.desc: Guru's onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole's unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations in this animated musical comedy.

programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars as Chuck Noland, a Federal Express efficiency expert, who is stranded on a remote island after his plane crashes. Forced to survive in isolation, he undertakes a journey of self-discovery that transforms him, both physically and emotionally.

programme.title: The Curious Case Of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: Benjamin Button, born in 1918 with the physical state of an elderly man, ages in reverse. He experiences love and break-ups, ecstasy and sorrow, and timelessness by the time he dies in 2003 as a baby.

programme.title: Jackie Brown
programme.desc: What do a sexy stewardess, a gun runner, a lonely bail bondsman, a shifty ex-con, a federal agent, and a stoned beach bunny have in common? They're six players on the trail of a half million dollars in the third feature film by Quentin Tarantino.

programme.title: Across The Universe
programme.desc: Across the Universe, from director Julie Taymor, is a revolutionary rock musical that re-imagines America in the turbulent late-1960s, a time when battle lines were being drawn at home and abroad.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A murder inside the Louvre, and clues in Da Vinci paintings, lead to the discovery of a religious mystery protected by a secret society for two thousand years, which could shake the foundations of Christianity.

programme.title: The Last Dragonslayer
programme.desc: In a world where magic is waning and technology prevails, 15-year-old Jennifer Strange runs a magician employment agency and discovers the last dragon is being hunted.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: Welcome to Rekall, the company that can turn your dreams into real memories. For Douglas Quaid, even though he's got a beautiful wife whom he loves, the mind-trip sounds like the perfect vacation from his frustrating life.

programme.title: The Karate Kid III
programme.desc: John Kreese, ostracised and penniless, tries to take revenge on Daniel and Miyagi with the assistance of a Vietnam War comrade who is the wealthy proprietor of a poisonous waste disposal business.

programme.title: Dragonheart: Battle For The Heartfire
programme.desc: Drago, a dragon who shares his heart with the king of Brittania, must find an heir to the throne when the king passes. But the potential heirs use their inherited dragon strength and fire power against each other to vie for the throne.

programme.title: The 6th Day
programme.desc: In a future where cloning is common, a corporation illegally clones humans. They mistakenly duplicate the wrong man, who now must evade assassination and reclaim his life.

programme.title: Stealth
programme.desc: The world's three best pilots are partnered with a state-of-the-art, fully-automated, pilotless, super stealth warplane - inhuman and invincible. But once in the air, it goes haywire, leaving them with one final mission - bring it down.

programme.title: Escape Plan
programme.desc: The world's foremost authority on structural security accepts a job to break out of an ultra-secret, high-tech facility. When he agrees, he is incarcerated in the most secret and secure prison on the planetand no one knows it is just a test.

programme.title: The Usual Suspects
programme.desc: After five criminals are released from a random police lineup, they plan a major heist that goes horribly awry. The police search for a mysterious crime lord, "Keyser Soze," who seems to be tied to the heist.

programme.title: Inside Man: Most Wanted
programme.desc: A hostage negotiator from the NYPD teams up with an FBI agent to save innocent lives when a cunning bank robber takes over the Federal Reserve Bank.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A murder inside the Louvre, and clues in Da Vinci paintings, lead to the discovery of a religious mystery protected by a secret society for two thousand years, which could shake the foundations of Christianity.

programme.title: City Of Ember
programme.desc: Ember was built as a refuge for humanity 200 years ago. Now, the great generator that powers the city is failing, and Ember is falling into darkness as the dazzling lights begin to flicker and fade.

programme.title: Welcome To Sudden Death
programme.desc: A former special forces officer working as a security guard battles a group of terrorists after they take hostages inside a basketball arena.

programme.title: The Karate Kid: Part II
programme.desc: After learning about his dying father, Mr Miyagi sets off to see him with Daniel. Upon reaching there, he decides to confront an old rival; meanwhile, Daniel inadvertently makes an enemy of his own.

programme.desc: After five criminals are released from a random police lineup, they plan a major heist that goes horribly awry. The police search for a mysterious crime lord, "Keyser Soze," who seems to be tied to the heist.

programme.title: The Karate Kid III
programme.desc: John Kreese, ostracised and penniless, tries to take revenge on Daniel and Miyagi with the assistance of a Vietnam War comrade who is the wealthy proprietor of a poisonous waste disposal business.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A murder inside the Louvre, and clues in Da Vinci paintings, lead to the discovery of a religious mystery protected by a secret society for two thousand years, which could shake the foundations of Christianity.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: Britt Reid is a rich, spoiled playboy who has been happy to maintain a direction-less existence. When his father James Reid dies, Britt meets an impressive and resourceful company employee, Kato.

programme.title: The Karate Kid: Part II
programme.desc: After learning about his dying father, Mr Miyagi sets off to see him with Daniel. Upon reaching there, he decides to confront an old rival; meanwhile, Daniel inadvertently makes an enemy of his own.

programme.title: Stealth
programme.desc: The world's three best pilots are partnered with a state-of-the-art, fully-automated, pilotless, super stealth warplane - inhuman and invincible. But once in the air, it goes haywire, leaving them with one final mission - bring it down.

programme.title: Welcome To Sudden Death
programme.desc: A former special forces officer working as a security guard battles a group of terrorists after they take hostages inside a basketball arena.

programme.title: Incredible Journeys with Simon Reeve S1 Ep4
programme.desc: In the final episode, Simon looks at his journeys through some of the world's most spectacular and unspoilt wildernesses, and reflects on the huge challenges faced when trying to protect them.

programme.title: Frozen Planet S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Summer - In Summer, there is 24 hour daylight in the Poles. The land becomes green and productive, and there is an abundance of food for the baby animals.

programme.title: One Cup: A Thousand Stories S1 Ep1
programme.desc: For The Love Of Tea - Tea is sustenance for mind, body and soul - the very lifeblood of humanity. The tribal De'ang people high in the mountains of Yunnan Province believe themselves to be literally made of tea.

programme.title: Earth S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Inferno - Chris Packham explores the dramatic moment nearly all life on Earth was wiped out.

programme.title: Secrets of the Jurassic Dinosaurs S1 Ep1

programme.desc: India and the Maldives - Heading across to India and the Maldives, Robson fishes for frogfish, manta rays, groupers and others with the help of local anglers.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S4 Ep1
programme.desc: Ascension Island - Robson's journey begins on Ascension Island, a tiny outpost with underfished waters in the middle of the Atlantic Ocean.

programme.title: Deep Dive Korea: Song Ji-Hyo's Haenyeo Adventure S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The lives of Jeju Island's female free divers are brought to the surface by one of South Korea's biggest television personalities - Song Ji-hyo as she takes on free diving with the legendary Haenyeo.

programme.title: Sue Perkins Into Alaska S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sue starts her Alaskan adventure in Anchorage, America's last frontier, to see if she has what it takes to survive in the wilderness; a place of adventure, beauty, and danger.

programme.title: The Secret Genius of Modern Life S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Air Fryer - Hannah looks at the air fryer - a device that's rapidly taking over people's kitchens, cooking up everything from bread rolls to baked Alaska and almost making our ovens obsolete! Not bad for something that's only been around for 15 years.

programme.title: Land of Primates S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Africa's Baboons - As humans take up more space, the baboons of Africa must adapt. Travel across the continent to watch them form unbreakable social bonds, serve to protect their families and survive a changing landscape.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Born to Be Different - This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a duck that wont go in the water without a ride from her pooch pal, an elephant that thinks shes a buffalo, and a herd of cows that adopt an orphaned deer.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends S1 Ep2
programme.desc: A Friend in Need - Meet more Amazing Animal Friends including Charlotte, a schnauzer who enjoys bath time with her guinea pig pal Wallace, and a randy ram called Hamish who likes to sneak off to live with a herd of dairy cows instead of his own kind.

programme.title: Survival of the Beast S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Orangutan - Investigate the art of nest making with the jungles master builder: the orangutan. Shadow Max as he tries to escape the insect-filled floor of the Borneo rainforest and takes inspiration from this solitary primates natural engineering prowess.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Seasonal - Watch the seasons wax and wane and learn how trees and animals help one another survive. Witness spring fireflies dancing after dark, discover summer fungi that cool off overheated trees, and prep for autumn migrations as the leaves begin to fall.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Water Worlds - Wade into wetlands, where trees and water meet to nurture new life. Dive into an underwater forest that protects young fur seals, visit a mangrove sanctuary where a curious band of aquatic misfits hides out, and meet some real-life swamp monsters.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Strength in Sisterhood - The Hollywood pride reels after the Nomads brutal attack on their leader, Ava, leaves her desperately weak and unable to hunt. To add to her woes, her hungry pride start rejecting her. But without her, they struggle to bring down prey.

programme.title: Land of Primates S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Africa's Baboons - As humans take up more space, the baboons of Africa must adapt. Travel across the continent to watch them form unbreakable social bonds, serve to protect their families and survive a changing landscape.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Born to Be Different - This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a duck that wont go in the water without a ride from her pooch pal, an elephant that thinks shes a buffalo, and a herd of cows that adopt an orphaned deer.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Growing Pains - Experience a roller coaster of emotions and growing pains as the sanctuarys orangutans move through six grades toward their release into the wild. Discover how Dillas fate suddenly changes, and watch as big boy Beni goes on an unwelcome diet.

programme.title: Alien Abyss S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Origin Stories - Get acquainted with an array of ocean oddballs and learn how billions of years worth of changes, from ice ages to asteroid strikes, have shaped their looks and skills. Meet blind worms who fish, walking sharks, tree-climbing crabs, and much more.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas S1 Ep7
programme.desc: South America - From the Amazon to the Andes, South America has some beautiful scenery. From guanacos sparring over grassland, to marine iguanas head-butting over a beachhead, to home-stealing hermit crabs, the quest for real estate causes a lot of conflict.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Seasonal - Watch the seasons wax and wane and learn how trees and animals help one another survive. Witness spring fireflies dancing after dark, discover summer fungi that cool off overheated trees, and prep for autumn migrations as the leaves begin to fall.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Water Worlds - Wade into wetlands, where trees and water meet to nurture new life. Dive into an underwater forest that protects young fur seals, visit a mangrove sanctuary where a curious band of aquatic misfits hides out, and meet some real-life swamp monsters.

programme.title: Alien Abyss S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Allies and Adversaries - Feel the love in the strange-but-heartwarming partnerships between some of Earths oddest creatures. Dive deep to see strange animals, from snapping shrimp to wolf eels, offer a hand to their fellow ocean-going weirdos to ensure mutual survival.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Ice - Trek to the planets quickly melting poles, where animals are giving scientists clues about our future existence. Learn how the movements of polar bears, penguins, and other arctic creatures could help humans map (and prevent) global warming.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Grasslands - Explore one of Earths most vital but overlooked habitats and learn how grasslands could slow climate change by soaking up more carbon than forests do. Meet key species, such as bison and pumas, that could restore this resource and heal our planet.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Punks on the Run - The lions of the Nomad pride rampage deep into the heart of the MK prides territory, scattering its members and coming dangerously close to the five new MK cubs. Meanwhile, the Hollywoods are recovering, and Avas survival skills are still intact.

programme.title: Land of Primates S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Zanzibar's Poison Monkey - Off the coast of Tanzania, baby Kima lives with his family of red Colobus monkeys. But what happens when he loses his way? Discover how this little monkey learns to adapt to life in the jungleand find out if he can reconnect with his family again.

programme.desc: Southeast Asia - With real-life dueling dragons, giant sumo-wrestling beetles, street-fighting monkeys, and sea turtles that play king of the hill on top of another sea turtle, Southeast Asia boasts a wide range of wildlife warriors.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Ice - Trek to the planets quickly melting poles, where animals are giving scientists clues about our future existence. Learn how the movements of polar bears, penguins, and other arctic creatures could help humans map (and prevent) global warming.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Grasslands - Explore one of Earths most vital but overlooked habitats and learn how grasslands could slow climate change by soaking up more carbon than forests do. Meet key species, such as bison and pumas, that could restore this resource and heal our planet.

programme.title: Alien Abyss S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Next Generation - Channel your inner sci-fi fan and explore the bizarre mating rituals of the oceans most peculiar creatures. Learn how bloody battles for mates, gender bending and supersize litters of babies just might secure a next generation for these animals.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Spoonbill Soft Shoe Shuffle - Join the teams scramble to help a trio of distressed baby wallabies and a koala joey whos having seizures. Scale a tree with rescuer Jo to net a wounded lizard, see kookaburra feather-implant surgery, and admire a spoonbills new corrective shoes.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Brisbane Floods - Wade into recovery mode as the clinic deals with the animal aftermath of a Brisbane flood. Meet a baby kangaroo in need of round-the-clock care and a plover washed down a drain. Then size up the turtle waiting list that vet Karina patiently tackles.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Punks Strike Back - After the dry season lowers the waters, siblings Kimba and Maya risk crossing the river to search for their parents. They run the gauntlet of the densest populations of crocs and hippos in Africa, and face an even greater threat on the other side.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island S1 Ep1

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep21
programme.desc: Hot, Hot, Hot - Aggro is embarrassed about big changes she's going through. And when she gets stuck in a volcano, the Rescue Riders seek help from ... Magnus?

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep22
programme.desc: Hot, Hot, Hot - When a mama Ironclaw dragon gets caught high on a mountain with a broken wing, Hannahr the blacksmith has to confront her fear of heights to help out.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep19
programme.desc: An Uphill Battle - The Dragon Knights make a deal for the Storm Wheel but first must obtain the other Storm Wheel from a mysterious mad scientist. Though Mastodon continues to warn the team about the dangers in using the Tianshang Weapons, they use them in a fight against Klaus and Veruca. The clash of the weapons wakes a dormant volcano!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep20
programme.desc: The Mad Scientist - The Mad Scientist turns out to be an ally called Akna, who has a history with Blade's brother Alfie. And Blade learns another truth about her brother and his mission. And in the course of a skirmish with Klaus and Veruca, the weapons change hands again.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep23
programme.desc: Stories - Artephius and the orphans are alone in town when a Celtic thunder god demands to be let into the treasure house or he will destroy San Lorenzo!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep24
programme.desc: Sphere - A piece of treasure that belongs to the Mole King is missing, and he won't give it up unless Puss helps him reunite with his ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep29
programme.desc: Lucky and the Big Goodbye - While Lucky attempts to win over a town that is unwelcoming to the circus, she starts to question her own reasoning to stay

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep30
programme.desc: Lucky and the Two-Wheeled Terror - When Lucky and the PALs arrive home from the circus, they find that Maricela and her new bicycle have become the star attraction in Miradero

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep51
programme.desc: Tall Tail/BFFF - Creek arrives at a Trolls potluck empty-handed, explaining that a strange creature ate the fondue he meant to bring. The Trolls nod sympathetically, but Branch alone doesnt believe this clearly made-up story. He sets out to prove Creek is a liar./ Branch presents Trolls Village with a time capsule which will survive the ages. The Trolls are excited by the prospect of making friends with future Trolls. Now if only they could agree what should actually go in the time capsule.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep25
programme.desc: Memory Spark / Wondertusk - Kelps learns about memory spark in an attempt to relive a memory of his grandmother. / Kelp and the underwater gang put on a show to showcase their imaginary sparks. As she practices, however, Scallop becomes convinced her tusk has a real spark!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep11
programme.desc: Catch Me If You Sam / Toy Driver - Its Tag and Scoochs first day of Race Cadets and Sam Whippet tells the Cadets that whoever can catch him in a race will be the new team captain. \ When Mom donates a box of Tags old toys to the new daycare center, Tag decides that the only way to get her box of toys back is to go around town collecting toys to swap out for her toys.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep7
programme.desc: Pet Project / Mission Improbable - When Mr. Tanaka adopts an unruly dog at Sams behest, the Zenkos have the job of training the mischievous mutt and turning him into mans best friend material. / When Ellie's friend Maria is late submitting her painting to the art show, its up to the Zenkos to get inside the community center after hours, avoiding overzealous junior security Rodney, and get Marias painting on display before the show starts.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep25
programme.desc: Belly Flop - The Riders have to save Elbone when he's swallowed by a giant Sea Gronckle, and Dak's awful cooking might be just the thing to do it.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep7
programme.desc: Big Trouble in Panda Village - The kids must leave Po to escape into the forest and head back to Panda Village to prepare against Jindiao

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep8
programme.desc: Secrets Lost to Shadow - The kids meet an unlikely ally when trying to find Po

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep7
programme.desc: Yeti Superstitious - Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his big bad year on the zodiac calendar which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNais superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he breaks up with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep17
programme.desc: Smoke Gets In Your Eyes - A rogue species of dragon terrorizes Berk by stealing all of the metal in town.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep18
programme.desc: Bing! Bang! Boom! - Three adolescent thunderdrums are wrecking havoc on Berk and only Thornado can control them.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep19
programme.desc: Cast Out (Part 1) - After disobeying orders, Snotlout is expelled from the academy. Meanwhile, Alvin comes to Berk to make amends- but can he be trusted?

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep77
programme.desc: The Unshakeable Bear - Boss scours Chicago to find his old co-worker nemesis Board Member Bradley, his key to cutting a deal with the Federal Agents for his freedom. However, he must lose the tail of Canadas most notorious fugitive tracker, a trained bear cub named Henri. Meanwhile, Tina is trapped at home with her paranoid grandma Yaya, forced to prove to her that shes not a criminal baby like the news is causing Yaya to believe.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep78
programme.desc: Ba-Ba Town - The Templetons hometown is overtaken by baby criminals, with Temp Baby Aubrey in charge. Boss has 48 hours to somehow restore them all to adulthood and turn them in, or face jail time himself. With Tina now acting like a dark angel of vengeance after feeling betrayed by Aubrey, Boss is forced to assemble a team from unlikely odd friends. Together, they launch a final mission to settle old scores and clear Boss Babys name.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep1
programme.desc: Scooter Buskie - The worlds worst baby is on the loose and Boss Baby, Tim and the team must find him before he turns the whole neighborhood against babies

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep16
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Harmful Horrors of the Harrowing Hiveschool - After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep7
programme.desc: Big Trouble in Panda Village - The kids must leave Po to escape into the forest and head back to Panda Village to prepare against Jindiao

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep51
programme.desc: Not My Boy Brandon / Shady Shawn - Tip and Oh get an annoying "tagalong" friend who won't leave them alone/The Tucci's go camping with Lucy's new boyfriend

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep51
programme.desc: Turbo Does Laundry Part 1/Part 2 - An exciting two-part episode of connected mini-stories following the crew that ends with Silent But Deadly and Thora deactivating a stink bomb.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep51
programme.desc: Dreadtrux Part 1 - The Dinotrux investigate when all of the other trux in the crater start running away from a mysterious mountain that may be coming alive.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep11
programme.desc: Hit or Myth in Greece - When Odlulu uses the Greek Myth Key to bring Greek myth to life and capture the Golden Fleece, the Wanderers embark on a legendary quest to restore order in modern Athens. With the help of Jason (of Argonaut fame) the Wanderers build a "Trojan Fritz" to help get past the Cyclops.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep25
programme.desc: Postman Pat's Pop Star Rescue - Everyone in Greendale is excited because pop superstar, Brad Lee is coming to Pencaster Bay to perform a concert. Unfortunately Brad's luxury private ship has broken down en route so Pat and Jess must head out to sea in the SDS boat and collect him. Meanwhile Julian, Meera, Bill and Sarah are on the train to Pencaster Bay with their mums to watch the concert. The kids enter into a cacophonous sing off' to decide who is the best singer. Pat and Jess collect Brad Lee from his ship only to find that he's afraid of small boats! Pat heads to shore as quickly as possible but unfortunately gets diverted to pick up a poorly puffin from Chris beacon at the lighthouse. Back at the Pencaster Bay the kids competitiveness leads to a dance off against the mums, who do surprisingly well. Pat finally manages to get the poorly puffin ashore to be treated by Amy the vet and Brad Lee goes on to perform a blistering concert by the seaside!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep51
programme.desc: Raa Raa Goes Hunting - Raa Raa has lost his toothbrush and sets off to find it. Where can it be?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep51
programme.desc: The Case Of The Unfunny Clown - Noddy and his friends are having a clown day and everyone is going to play at being clowns. Noddy shows Fuse his smelling flower joke but Fuse realises he isn't programmed to understand clowning. The clowning goes too far when someone sets up a bucket of balls joke that almost causes an accident. Noddy needs to investigate to find out who is the unfunny clown before a joke' goes too far. Using all his detecting skills and reconsidering evidence, Noddy works out that the unfunny clown is actually Fuse! He didn't realise that the clowning jokes he was playing on the other toys weren't actually funny! Noddy shows Fuse a way in which he can join in with the clowning in a safe way and Clown Day can go ahead after all. Well done Noddy! Case closed!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep103
programme.desc: Grubby Ahoy - Grubby has got stuck on Aunt Tulip's boat. Can anybody save him before he floats away?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep26
programme.desc: Clamshell Day - Kelp is excited to celebrate his right of passage, breaking the ice with his horn. But when he struggles to break the ice like other narwhals, he is determined to do it the Kelp way.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep26
programme.desc: Game of Horns - At a big town festival, Magnus challenges Duggard in a competition to be chief of Huttsgalor! Can the Riders help their friend keep his helmet?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep38
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shocking Showdown of the Staggering Sugamechangere - It's parents' weekend at Lake Summer Camp, and Krupp's eager to make amends with Harold and George ... or so he says.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep42
programme.desc: The Dragon Knights Part 1 - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep39
programme.desc: Pyg & Tam - Boss Baby encounters a new threat to Baby Love: an adorable Baby TV show starring Pyg the Pygmy Goat, Tam the Tamandua, and their host Maria-Maria. Boss is told not to go to Corporate War by Board Baby Emiliano, so Boss tries to provoke his enemies to make the first move.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep8
programme.desc: Toad-al Recall - A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crews life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items but Jin and Peng arent so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toads magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep18
programme.desc: Bing! Bang! Boom! - Three adolescent thunderdrums are wrecking havoc on Berk and only Thornado can control them.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep38
programme.desc: The Partier's Apprentice / Hair Ball - Guy is running himself ragged trying to be the life of the party for every party in Troll Village. When Poppy suggests he train an apprentice, it seems like the solution to his problems! Until his apprentice starts to surpass his partying skills/When Smidge accidentally agrees to go with both Milton and Guy to the Trolls fanciest event, the Hair Ball, she must navigate the difficulties of her situation with help from her friends.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep23
programme.desc: Spark Bees / Best in Show - The kids scare away a swarm of bees. But when they realize bees make the flowers happy, they hatch a plan to get them back! / When Scallop makes a bad choice, Kelp helps her learn from her mistakes.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep24
programme.desc: Superfan / Barb - Kelp and the rest of his friends put on a game of rainbow ball, but Kelp begins to wonder how well his special spark can help him truly measure up to his favorite player. / When the underwater friends meet someone new, theyre reminded that their differences make them unique.

programme.title: Go Dog Go! Ep35
programme.desc: Whatever It Cakes / Haturday - When Scooch is selected to present a cake on the hit show, Whatever it Cakes, Tag agrees to drive him to the studio in Chew York City. But getting there will be harder than they imagined. / Lady Lydia is hosting Haturday for her family this year but she cant seem to find the feathers on her Haturday hat. Tag will help retrace her steps and Scooch will take care of the guests while they search.

programme.title: Go Dog Go! Ep36
programme.desc: Trick or Thief / Meow-Lo-Ween - Tag and Scooch attend a Howl-O-Ween costume party at the Big Bowl Diner, excited to get a taste of Wagnes famous Pupclairs. But when the lights go out and the treats go missing, it's up to Tag to solve the case. / Tag and Scooch are determined to throw a Howl-O-Ween party for their cat friends in Meowbuquerque, but they must get the dogs of Pawston to change their ways so they can make the celebration more cat-friendly.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep9
programme.desc: Lost and Found / In the Park In the Dark - The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! Team Zenko must help Rodney face his fear of the dark so he can get the last picture for his collection.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep10
programme.desc: Longest Yardwork / The Girl Who Cried Goose - Donna plans a garden party for Rona, but the only problem is that her garden is overgrown and neglected. The team try to transform this jungle into a backyard just in time for the party. / Lula finds an angry goose on the loose, and Team Zenko need to get it out of the park before soccer camp starts.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep23
programme.desc: King Burple - After Burple and Cutter crash-land in a village of tiny dragons, Burple's unintentional act of courage leads the locals to crown him as their king.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep24
programme.desc: Charged Up - Magnus's superpowered mechano-dragon threatens to replace the Riders. But when it spirals out of control, the town's real heroes have to step up!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep21
programme.desc: Apok-ta-pokalypse Now Part 1 - As the Dragon Knights prepare to battle for the weapons and control of Tikal, Mastodon attempts to teach Po how to access storm powers to use in the fight. Blade comes face to face with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep22
programme.desc: Apok-ta-pokalypse Now Part 2 - The team heads into a final confrontation for the weapons that not only threatens Tikal, but their lives. And Po must share hero duties with Mastodon.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep25
programme.desc: Si - Puss fights the Duchess to retrieve the first coin he ever took from the Treasure House, which can help him restore San Lorenzo's protective spell.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep26
programme.desc: No - Puss in Boots returns to San Lorenzo at the behest of Dulcinea, to flush out an imposter masquerading as the town's protector.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep31
programme.desc: Lucky and the Rough Ride - The PALs join AI and Javier on a mustang drive, but when Javier gets injured, its up to Lucky and Spirit to get him to safety

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep32
programme.desc: Lucky and the Ghostly Gotcha! - When Snips claims not to be afraid of ghosts, the PALs decide to give him a fun Halloween scare hell never forget!

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep52
programme.desc: Switcher-Ruby/Bye Bye Bunker - Poppy and Branch switch bodies, and learn to appreciate each others point of view. /When Branch decides its time for him to move out of the bunker, Poppy tries to be as supportive as she can, even though it seems Branch himself may have some doubts.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep26
programme.desc: Clamshell Day - Kelp is excited to celebrate his right of passage, breaking the ice with his horn. But when he struggles to break the ice like other narwhals, he is determined to do it the Kelp way.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep12
programme.desc: Frank and Beans with Chili / Little Hound on the Prairie - Beans is nervous that Frank is starting to make a new best friend, so Beans enlists Tag to help him win Frank back. \ Grandpaw and Grandmaw tell Tag the story of the early days of Pawston. Tags ancestor, Tagatha, built a steam-engine and turned Pawston from a one-house town into a thriving community.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep8
programme.desc: An Inconvenient Tooth / Up, Up and Away - After Lula loses her loose tooth in the park, Team Zenko must find the missing molar and get it under Lulas pillow in time for the Tooth Fairys visit. / Gabriel and Luis show off their new drone but it crash lands on the roof top. Team Zenko's mission is to try and get it back, but Yolanda won't give up her new hi-tech friend that easily.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep26
programme.desc: Game of Horns - At a big town festival, Magnus challenges Duggard in a competition to be chief of Huttsgalor! Can the Riders help their friend keep his helmet?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep9
programme.desc: Out of the Cave and Onto Thin Ice - After a shocking revelation, Po is determined to get his chi back and Jing decides to face Jindiao

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep10
programme.desc: Return of the Four Constellations - The kids go to the Spirit Realm and meet the Original Four Constellations in the hopes of learning how to defeat Jindiao

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep8
programme.desc: Toad-al Recall - A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crews life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items but Jin and Peng arent so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toads magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep20
programme.desc: Cast Out (Part 2) - Hiccup and the gang must rescue Stoick with assistance from Berks archenemy Alvin.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep11
programme.desc: View To A Skrill (Part 2) - Tuffnut goes undercover to help the gang rescue a Skrill captured by the Beserkers.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep12
programme.desc: The Flight Stuff - With Snotlouts fate unclear, Gustav tries to fill in for him at the Dragon Academy.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep2
programme.desc: Cat's in the Cradle - When an unexpected kitten shows up on Boss Babys doorstep, they go head to head against the feline enemy

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep3
programme.desc: Family Fun Night - The Templetons head to a new family restaurant only to run into Bootsy Calico!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep4
programme.desc: Formula for Menace: A Dekker Moonboots Mystery - When Baby Corp babies start aging, panic hits the office and the babies set out to find out if someone has been tainting the formula

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep19
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shadowy Syndrome of the Sinister Splotch - Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep20
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Blitzkrieg of the Bothersome Butt-erflies - As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep21
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Problematic Pandemonium of the Punishing Plungerina - After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Dream Team Trouble - After Glitch accidentally destroys part of the Academy, he and Ubercorn have a huge argument. When he heads to Grim HQ to make amends, Ubercorn is accidentally trapped.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep42
programme.desc: Floating Farms, Bangladesh - Glitch's trip to a funky floating farm becomes a rescue mission on a fast-flowing river.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep10
programme.desc: Thomas Makes a Mistake - After Thomas makes a mistake with an important silk delivery in India, he causes chaos and confusion by not seeking help.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep25
programme.desc: Lost Librarian - The Librarian has lost his big reference book and Sarah thinks her toy periscope might help with the search.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep24
programme.desc: Cake Relocate - Cake is tired of living in the fridge, so Sarah & Duck help him think about where else he would like to stay.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Carnival - Stanley, Sophie and Benjamin make up a new game, 'Dino-Pirates'. This is such a good game, they use it as inspiration for Stanley's carnival float.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Bubbles - Stanley cleans Cynthia's bus, but each time he does it keeps getting dirty again. It's so dirty by the end, he invents a super-duper cleaning machine that makes a sea of bubbles.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep59
programme.desc: Camping - Monty tries to pack too many items for a camping trip, but he learns that sometimes less is more after he and Jimmy Jones work together.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep12
programme.desc: It's time for carnival - JoJo wants to celebrate the St Lucia carnival with Great Gran Gran, but it's too far away to travel to! Instead, JoJo and Gran Gran have their own carnival in the garden!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep22
programme.desc: Whale Watching - Bluey promises her customer, Bingo, the best tour ever in a game of Whale Watching, but they need Mum and Dad to join in, and they are too tired to play after a late night.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep23
programme.desc: Family Meeting - When Dad's accused of fluffing in Bluey's face as he climbed out of bed, he's put on trial with Mum as the judge, and Bluey and Bingo as witnesses. Bluey might also have to explain what she was doing there.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep24
programme.desc: Faceytalk - Bluey and Bingo love to video chat with Muffin and Socks so they can all draw pictures together. When Muffin won't give Socks a turn, the kids discover what happens when you hog.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep8
programme.desc: The Big Day Out Badge - Duggee takes the Squirrels and their parents on an exciting mystery trip.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep7
programme.desc: The Pen Pal Badge - Duggee arranges for the Squirrels to write to some pen pals.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep6
programme.desc: The Being Quiet Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels go on an adventure to find a famously shy creature.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Table Mountain, South Africa - Glitch wants to ski, so the Grimbots give Table Mountain a snowy peak, which threatens its rare plants.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Corn - Live from the Roots & Fruits theatre, it's Corn singing an A-maiz-ing Counting Song about his remarkably organised kernel rows.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Orange - Live from the Roots & Fruits theatre, it's the daring Orange attempting to cross the stage on a tightrope, if she manages to ignore any distractions.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep43
programme.desc: Pea Repeats - Supertato is due to receive the Best Hero Award, but Evil Pea decides she should get it. Carrot tells her she needs to defeat herself to win the award.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep44
programme.desc: Da Veggie Code - Supertato's Tato belt gets locked inside a glass case for an exhibition, but Tomato can't remember the code to get it out again, and Supertato needs it back to defeat Evil Pea.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep92
programme.desc: Feeling Better - It's time to wake up but Tinky Winky isn't feeling well. Soon, Tinky Winky feels better but now Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po don't feel well.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S7 Ep24
programme.desc: X - Dee encourages a friend to say 'x', and they go on an adventure around the sound. They meet a Tyrannosaurus rex, a fox with chicken pox and an ox on a box!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep43
programme.desc: The Missing Star - It's Christmas time in Pop Paper City. Plom and Zip are decorating the tree, so they craft a new Christmas star. When Plom loses the star, its unknown if he and Zip will be able to find it again.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Planet Wobble - Messy and friends rocket into space, but a mischievous Messy sends OKIDO's seasons into chaos! Time to fix this planet wobble.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep26
programme.desc: Fairy Tale - Dad tells Bluey and Bingo a real-life fairy tale about growing up in a wild place called the '80s, about a boy who was cursed when he was mean to his little brother.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep37
programme.desc: The Decider - The Heelers and Lucky's family get together to watch the big game, a fun family experiences that gets a little tense.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep2
programme.desc: The Face Painting Badge - The Squirrels are looking for Duggee but can't find him. Instead, they find someone who looks like Enid, only much too big. Duggee has painted his face to look like Enid!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep1
programme.desc: The Carrot Badge - The Squirrels are admiring Duggee's crop of giant carrots when they hear a noise. They find the Rabbits busy preparing for the Carrot Solstice.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep10
programme.desc: The Metal Detector Badge - Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Mount Etna, Italy - When Grandmaster Glitch makes popcorn in Mount Etna, Italy, he blocks the volcano and endangers farms on its slopes.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Table Mountain, South Africa - Glitch wants to ski, so the Grimbots give Table Mountain a snowy peak, which threatens its rare plants.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep16
programme.desc: Army - Jack is the new dog at school and the newest recruit in Rusty's Army. Jack struggles with following instructions and always forgets his hat, but Rusty will make a soldier of him yet.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep15
programme.desc: Trains - All aboard the Dad Train! Bingo goes from home to daycare to her job at the vet every morning, but there's trouble on the line as a mischievous Bluey throws everyone off schedule.

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Magyarosaurus & Reeds - Andy travels back 70 million years to meet the miniature magyarosaurus, but when he arrives on their prehistoric island home he has to hide from a giant flying reptile.

programme.title: Dog Squad S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Mission: Muddy Puddle - Meagaidh the Border Collie is a search and rescue dog who works with her owner Tom. Joe and his daughter Kate are lost at the top of a really steep hill. Tom and Meagaidh must race to find them.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild S2 Ep12
programme.desc: Zebra and Red-Bellied Piranha - This episode features the zebra and the red-bellied piranha. Their wild connection is they live in large groups, increasing their chance of survival.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep14
programme.desc: The Big Book of Pirate World Records - Captain Captain wants to get Sandy, Seaweed and herself into the Big Book of Pirate World Records and sets the pirates the task of trying to break a record to get their names in the book!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep44
programme.desc: The Comedy Badge - Tag stumbles on some toy blocks and hurts his knee. How can they make him feel better?

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep43
programme.desc: The Looking After Badge - Outside the clubhouse a large crowd has gathered around a hot air balloon.

programme.desc: Lightweight Title - When Khabib Nurmagomedov retired from MMA, the UFCs lightweight title was up for grabs. See the journey of the 155-pound belt following the Khabib Era on UFC Unleashed. Featuring Charles Oliveira, Dustin Poirier, Islam Makhachev, and more.

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC306OMalleyvsDvalishvili
programme.desc: For the first time ever, Sphere Las Vegas hosts the UFC, as devastating striker Suga Sean OMalley defends his title for the second time against the indomitable wrestler Merab The Machine Dvalishvili.

programme.title: LIGUE 1 TOP 10 COLLECTIVE PLAY
programme.desc: LIGUE 1 TOP 10 COLLECTIVE PLAY - Nothing more satisfying than a flowing team move with the finish. 10 of the best plays from 22/23.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC312DuPlessisvsStrickland
programme.desc: UFC returns down under to Sydney, Austalia, where Middleweight champion Dricus Du Plessis defends his crown against Sean Strickland, the man he took it from, and undefeated TUF 23 winner Tatiana Suarez aims to unseat 2-time champion Zhang Weili for the Women's Strawweight title. Plus more on UFC Reloaded!

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep11
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep28
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1003MorenovsFigueiredo3
programme.desc: UFC 270 featured the third meeting between flyweight rivals Deiveson Figueiredo and Mexican champion Brandon Moreno. Relive their incredible battle like youve never seen it with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC312DuPlessisvsStrickland
programme.desc: UFC returns down under to Sydney, Austalia, where Middleweight champion Dricus Du Plessis defends his crown against Sean Strickland, the man he took it from, and undefeated TUF 23 winner Tatiana Suarez aims to unseat 2-time champion Zhang Weili for the Women's Strawweight title. Plus more on UFC Reloaded!

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts Ep1003
programme.desc: Ultimate Knockouts "Hispanic Heritage Month 2023 - UFC Ultimate Knockouts celebrates Hispanic Heritage Month. See Edson Barboza, Polyana Viana, Marlon Vera, and more.

programme.title: UFC Countdown EpUFC308TopuriavsHolloway
programme.desc: UFC 308 Countdown previews the promotions return to Abu Dhabi, where featherweight king, Ilia El Matador Topuria, defends his title against Max Blessed Holloway. Plus, middleweights collide as Robert Whittaker takes on Khamzat Chimaev.

programme.title: ROAD TO UFC SEASON 4 Ep1
programme.desc: UFC Performance Institute Shanghai once again this weekend will host back-to-back days of the opening round for ROAD TO UFC Season 4, the hugely successful win and advance tournament that will take top MMA prospects from Asia Pacific and give them a pathway to a UFC contract. In the opening round, 32 mixed martial arts athletes will be competing in each of four weight classes, and four non-tournament bouts will be included to provide more opportunities to showcase up-and-comers.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep704
programme.desc: UFC Connected "Origins: Kayla Harrison, Fighter Focus: Jim Miller, Ultimate Access: Chute Boxe, Day 1: Cody Garbrandt - Olympic Judo world champion Kayla Harrison details her transition into MMA, revealing her resilience through childhood abuse, and channeling her pain into athletic triumphs. The UFCs marathon man looks back at this record-breaking career and details his approach to the fight game that has seen him compete at the sports highest level for decades. Exclusive access to a special ceremony held at the original site of the Chute Boxe academy where Charles Oliveira is awarded his black belt by Chute Boxe founder Rudimar Fedrigo. Former Bantamweight champion Cody Garbrandt looks back at the impressive UFC debut performance that launched his decorated career.

programme.desc: UFC 270 featured the third meeting between flyweight rivals Deiveson Figueiredo and Mexican champion Brandon Moreno. Relive their incredible battle like youve never seen it with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep704
programme.desc: UFC Connected "Origins: Kayla Harrison, Fighter Focus: Jim Miller, Ultimate Access: Chute Boxe, Day 1: Cody Garbrandt - Olympic Judo world champion Kayla Harrison details her transition into MMA, revealing her resilience through childhood abuse, and channeling her pain into athletic triumphs. The UFCs marathon man looks back at this record-breaking career and details his approach to the fight game that has seen him compete at the sports highest level for decades. Exclusive access to a special ceremony held at the original site of the Chute Boxe academy where Charles Oliveira is awarded his black belt by Chute Boxe founder Rudimar Fedrigo. Former Bantamweight champion Cody Garbrandt looks back at the impressive UFC debut performance that launched his decorated career.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed Ep1803
programme.desc: Lightweight Title - When Khabib Nurmagomedov retired from MMA, the UFCs lightweight title was up for grabs. See the journey of the 155-pound belt following the Khabib Era on UFC Unleashed. Featuring Charles Oliveira, Dustin Poirier, Islam Makhachev, and more.

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC306OMalleyvsDvalishvili
programme.desc: For the first time ever, Sphere Las Vegas hosts the UFC, as devastating striker Suga Sean OMalley defends his title for the second time against the indomitable wrestler Merab The Machine Dvalishvili.

programme.title: LIGUE 1 TOP 10 COLLECTIVE PLAY
programme.desc: LIGUE 1 TOP 10 COLLECTIVE PLAY - Nothing more satisfying than a flowing team move with the finish. 10 of the best plays from 22/23.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC312DuPlessisvsStrickland
programme.desc: UFC returns down under to Sydney, Austalia, where Middleweight champion Dricus Du Plessis defends his crown against Sean Strickland, the man he took it from, and undefeated TUF 23 winner Tatiana Suarez aims to unseat 2-time champion Zhang Weili for the Women's Strawweight title. Plus more on UFC Reloaded!
